description: Big Cat Canyon is breathtaking. Unfortunately, you're stuck here as long as that huge lion is blocking your path.

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically turn on yellow lights and automatically play the lion sound. Then make Dash instantly show the pattern in the eye ring.
puzzles.introduction: An irritable lion should be yellow, have a good roar, and look angry!

hints.description: Link the Yellow light and the Lion sound with Auto cues. Link the Eye Ring with an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: After the eye ring, make Dash to turn to your voice when you speak.
puzzles.introduction: What happens if the lion hears you?

hints.description: Link the Voice Turn state with a Voice Heard cue.

puzzles.description: After Dash turns to the voice, make Dash automatically move forward 30 cm. Then make Dash automatically play another lion sound.
puzzles.introduction: If the lion hears you, it might attack!

hints.description: Set the Move To state to 30 cm in the forward direction. Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: After Dash plays the second lion sound, make Dash turn on magenta lights when an obstacle is seen close behind.
puzzles.introduction: Give the lion a scratch on the back to calm it down.

hints.description: Link the Magenta light with an Obstacle Seen cue. Make sure the cue is set to only detect obstacles that are very close behind Dash.

puzzles.description: After Dash turns on magenta lights, make Dash automatically play a cat sound. Then make Dash instantly dance left.
puzzles.introduction: That's quite a trick, turning a lion into a cat!

hints.description: Link the Cat sound with an Auto cue. Link the Dance Left state with an Instant cue.
